description: Cumulative patch manifest for iterative ChatGPT patch rounds.
notes: This file exists to make cumulative patch zips deterministic: include every file listed here (latest version) plus any newly changed/added files each round.
If you do not need cumulative patches, you can ignore this file.

patch_info.description: Cumulative patch: Add a new Scroll of Earth that raises boulders around the reader (and can fill adjacent chasms / pelt adjacent hostile monsters). Also expands the inventory effect-preview text for several identifiable items. Includes a regression test for Scroll of Earth.

summary: Added Scroll of Earth: raises boulders in the 8 surrounding tiles, can fill adjacent chasms, and may pelt adjacent hostile monsters.
Inventory effect previews now include additional potions/scrolls (e.g., Invisibility/Clarity/Levitation) so identified items show clear EFFECT text.
Added a unit test verifying Scroll of Earth raises surrounding boulders in a valid open area.
